pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# vodesfuncContains various functions for automation and other stuff I use in my scripts### This is by no means me trying to be professional and as such, the code will not be treated like it.
## Installation`pip install vodesfunc`
for ~~mostly~~ stable versions`pip install git+https://github.com/Vodes/vodesfunc.git`
for absolutely latest
